022package com.restfb.util;
023
024import static com.restfb.logging.RestFBLogger.UTILS_LOGGER;
025
026import java.text.ParseException;
027import java.util.Date;
028import java.util.Optional;
029
030/**
031 * A collection of date-handling utility methods.
032 * 
033 * @author <a href="http://restfb.com">Mark Allen</a>
034 * @since 1.6
035 */
036public final class DateUtils {
037  /**
038   * Facebook "long" date format (IETF RFC 3339). Example: {@code 2010-02-28T16:11:08+0000}
039   */
040  public static final String FACEBOOK_LONG_DATE_FORMAT = "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssZ";
041
042  /**
043   * Facebook "long" date format (IETF RFC 3339) without a timezone component. Example: {@code 2010-02-28T16:11:08}
044   */
045  public static final String FACEBOOK_LONG_DATE_FORMAT_WITHOUT_TIMEZONE = "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss";
046
047  /**
048   * Facebook "long" date format (IETF RFC 3339) without a timezone or seconds component. Example:
049   * {@code 2010-02-28T16:11}
050   */
051  public static final String FACEBOOK_LONG_DATE_FORMAT_WITHOUT_TIMEZONE_OR_SECONDS = "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm";
052
053  /**
054   * Facebook short date format. Example: {@code 04/15/1984}
055   */
056  public static final String FACEBOOK_SHORT_DATE_FORMAT = "MM/dd/yyyy";
057
058  /**
059   * Facebook alternate short date format. Example: {@code 2012-09-15}
060   */
061  public static final String FACEBOOK_ALTERNATE_SHORT_DATE_FORMAT = "yyyy-MM-dd";
062
063  /**
064   * Facebook month-year only date format. Example: {@code Example: 2007-03}
065   */
066  public static final String FACEBOOK_MONTH_YEAR_DATE_FORMAT = "yyyy-MM";
067
068  /**
069   * DateFormatStrategy (default: SimpleDateFormat).
070   */
071  private static DateFormatStrategy strategy = new SimpleDateFormatStrategy();
072
073  /**
074   * Prevents instantiation.
075   */
076  private DateUtils() {
077    throw new IllegalStateException("DateUtils must not be instantiated");
078  }
079
080  /**
081   * Returns a Java representation of a Facebook "long" {@code date} string, or the number of seconds since the epoch.
082   * <p>
083   * Supports dates with or without timezone information.
084   * 
085   * @param date
086   *          Facebook {@code date} string.
087   * @return Java date representation of the given Facebook "long" {@code date} string or {@code null} if {@code date}
088   *         is {@code null} or invalid.
089   */
090  public static Date toDateFromLongFormat(String date) {
091    if (isNull(date)) {
092      return null;
093    }
094
095    // Is this an all-digit date? Then assume it's the "seconds since epoch"
096    // variant
097    if (date.trim().matches("\\d+")) {
098      return new Date(Long.parseLong(date) * 1000L);
099    }
100
101    Date parsedDate = toDateWithFormatString(date, FACEBOOK_LONG_DATE_FORMAT);
102
103    // Fall back to variant without timezone if the initial parse fails
104    if (isNull(parsedDate)) {
105      parsedDate = toDateWithFormatString(date, FACEBOOK_LONG_DATE_FORMAT_WITHOUT_TIMEZONE);
106    }
107
108    // Fall back to variant without seconds if secondary parse fails
109    if (isNull(parsedDate)) {
110      parsedDate = toDateWithFormatString(date, FACEBOOK_LONG_DATE_FORMAT_WITHOUT_TIMEZONE_OR_SECONDS);
111    }
112
113    return parsedDate;
114  }
115
116  private static boolean isNull(Object date) {
117    return date == null;
118  }
119
120  /**
121   * Returns a Java representation of a Facebook "short" {@code date} string.
122   * 
123   * @param date
124   *          Facebook {@code date} string.
125   * @return Java date representation of the given Facebook "short" {@code date} string or {@code null} if {@code date}
126   *         is {@code null} or invalid.
127   */
128  public static Date toDateFromShortFormat(String date) {
129    if (isNull(date)) {
130      return null;
131    }
132
133    Date parsedDate = toDateWithFormatString(date, FACEBOOK_SHORT_DATE_FORMAT);
134
135    // Fall back to variant if initial parse fails
136    if (isNull(parsedDate)) {
137      parsedDate = toDateWithFormatString(date, FACEBOOK_ALTERNATE_SHORT_DATE_FORMAT);
138    }
139
140    return parsedDate;
141  }
142
143  /**
144   * Returns a Java representation of a Facebook "month-year" {@code date} string.
145   * 
146   * @param date
147   *          Facebook {@code date} string.
148   * @return Java date representation of the given Facebook "month-year" {@code date} string or {@code null} if
149   *         {@code date} is {@code null} or invalid.
150   */
151  public static Date toDateFromMonthYearFormat(String date) {
152    if (isNull(date)) {
153      return null;
154    }
155
156    if ("0000-00".equals(date)) {
157      return null;
158    }
159
160    return toDateWithFormatString(date, FACEBOOK_MONTH_YEAR_DATE_FORMAT);
161  }
162
163  /**
164   * Returns a String representation of a {@code date} object
165   * 
166   * @param date
167   *          as Date
168   * @return String representation of a {@code date} object. The String is in the form {@code 2010-02-28T16:11:08}
169   */
170  public static String toLongFormatFromDate(Date date) {
171    return Optional.ofNullable(date).map(strategy.formatFor(FACEBOOK_LONG_DATE_FORMAT_WITHOUT_TIMEZONE)::format).orElse(null);
172  }
173
174  /**
175   * Returns a <strong>short</strong> String representation of a {@code date} object
176   *
177   * @param date
178   *          as Date
179   * @return String representation of a {@code date} object. The String is in the form {@code 2019-06-14}
180   */
181  public static String toShortFormatFromDate(Date date) {
182    return Optional.ofNullable(date).map(strategy.formatFor(FACEBOOK_ALTERNATE_SHORT_DATE_FORMAT)::format).orElse(null);
183  }
184
185  /**
186   * Returns a Java representation of a {@code date} string.
187   * 
188   * @param date
189   *          Date in string format.
190   * @return Java date representation of the given {@code date} string or {@code null} if {@code date} is {@code null}
191   *         or invalid.
192   */
193  private static Date toDateWithFormatString(String date, String format) {
194    if (isNull(date)) {
195      return null;
196    }
197
198    try {
199      return strategy.formatFor(format).parse(date);
200    } catch (ParseException e) {
201      UTILS_LOGGER.trace("Unable to parse date '{}' using format string '{}': {}", date, format, e);
202      return null;
203    }
204  }
205
206  /**
207   * get the current DateFormatStrategy.
208   * 
209   * @return the current DateFormatStrategy
210   */
211  public static DateFormatStrategy getDateFormatStrategy() {
212    return strategy;
213  }
214
215  /**
216   * set the {@link DateFormatStrategy}.
217   * 
218   * default value: {@link SimpleDateFormatStrategy}
219   * 
220   * @param dateFormatStrategy
221   *          the used {@link DateFormatStrategy}
222   * 
223   */
224  public static void setDateFormatStrategy(DateFormatStrategy dateFormatStrategy) {
225    strategy = dateFormatStrategy;
226  }
227}
